verses.verse: The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> <S%H3068>"Behold,<s%> Yahweh <S%H7392>rides<s%> on a <S%H7031>swift<s%> <S%H5645>cloud,<s%> and <S%H935>comes<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> The <S%H457>idols<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> will <S%H5128>tremble<s%> at his <S%H6440>presence;<s%> and the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> will <S%H4549>melt<s%> in its <S%H7130>midst.<s%>

I will <S%H5526>stir<s%> up the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> against the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> and they will <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> against his <S%H251>brother,<s%> and <S%H376>everyone<s%> against his <S%H7453>neighbor;<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> against <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> against <S%H4467>kingdom.<s%>

The <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> will <S%H1238>fail<s%> in its <S%H7130>midst.<s%> I will <S%H1104>destroy<s%> its <S%H6098>counsel.<s%> They will <S%H1875>seek<s%> the <S%H457>idols,<s%> the <S%H328>charmers,<s%> those who have familiar <S%H178>spirits,<s%> and the <S%H3049>wizards.<s%>

<S%H853>I<s%> will give <S%H5534>over<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of a <S%H7186>cruel<s%> <S%H113>lord.<s%> A <S%H5794>fierce<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> will <S%H4910>rule<s%> over <S%H5002>them,<s%>" says the <S%H113>Lord,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>
The <S%H4325>waters<s%> will <S%H5405>fail<s%> from the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and the <S%H5104>river<s%> will be <S%H2717>wasted<s%> and become <S%H3001>dry.<s%>

The <S%H5104>rivers<s%> will <S%H2186>become<s%> <S%H2186>foul.<s%> The <S%H2975>streams<s%> of <S%H4693>Egypt<s%> will be <S%H1809>diminished<s%> and dried <S%H2717>up.<s%> The <S%H7070>reeds<s%> and <S%H5488>flags<s%> will wither <S%H7060>away.<s%>

The <S%H6169>meadows<s%> by the <S%H2975>Nile,<s%> by the <S%H6310>brink<s%> of the <S%H2975>Nile,<s%> and all the <S%H4218>sown<s%> fields of the <S%H2975>Nile,<s%> will become <S%H3001>dry,<s%> be driven <S%H5086>away,<s%> and be no more.

The <S%H1771>fishermen<s%> will <S%H578>lament,<s%> and all those <S%H7993>who<s%> <S%H2443>fish<s%> in the <S%H2975>Nile<s%> will <S%H56>mourn,<s%> and those who <S%H6566>spread<s%> <S%H4365>nets<s%> <S%H6440>on<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> will <S%H535>languish.<s%>
Moreover those who <S%H5647>work<s%> in <S%H8305>combed<s%> <S%H6593>flax,<s%> and those who <S%H707>weave<s%> white <S%H2355>cloth,<s%> will be <S%H954>confounded.<s%>
The <S%H8356>pillars<s%> will be <S%H1792>broken<s%> in <S%H6213>pieces.<s%> All those who work for <S%H7938>hire<s%> will be <S%H99>grieved<s%> in <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

The <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H6814>Zoan<s%> are utterly <S%H191>foolish.<s%> The <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H2450>wisest<s%> <S%H3289>counselors<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> has become <S%H1197>stupid.<s%> How do you <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> "I am the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6924>ancient<s%> <S%H4428>kings?<s%>"

<S%H335>Where<s%> <S%H645>then<s%> are your <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H5046>men?<s%> Let them tell you <S%H3045>now;<s%> and let them know what <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> has <S%H3289>purposed<s%> concerning <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

The <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H6814>Zoan<s%> have become <S%H2973>fools.<s%> The <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H5297>Memphis<s%> are <S%H5377>deceived.<s%> They have caused <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to go <S%H8582>astray,<s%> who are the <S%H6438>cornerstone<s%> of her <S%H7626>tribes.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H4537>mixed<s%> a <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H5773>perverseness<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H4714>her;<s%> and they have caused Egypt to go <S%H8582>astray<s%> in all of its <S%H4639>works,<s%> like a <S%H7910>drunken<s%> man <S%H8582>staggers<s%> in his <S%H6892>vomit.<s%>
Neither shall there be any <S%H4639>work<s%> for <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> which <S%H7218>head<s%> or <S%H2180>tail,<s%> palm <S%H3712>branch<s%> or <S%H100>rush,<s%> may <S%H6213>do.<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> will be like <S%H802>women.<s%> They will <S%H2729>tremble<s%> and <S%H6342>fear<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H8573>shaking<s%> of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> which he shakes over <S%H5130>them.<s%>

The <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> will become a <S%H2283>terror<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> Everyone to whom <S%H2142>mention<s%> is made of it will be <S%H6342>afraid,<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H6098>plans<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> which he determines against <S%H3289>it.<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day,<s%> there will be <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> that <S%H1696>speak<s%> the <S%H8193>language<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> and <S%H7650>swear<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%> <S%H259>One<s%> will be <S%H559>called<s%> "The <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H2041>destruction.<s%>"

In that <S%H3117>day,<s%> there will be an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and a <S%H4676>pillar<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H681>at<s%> its <S%H1366>border.<s%>

It will be for a <S%H226>sign<s%> and for a <S%H5707>witness<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> for they will <S%H6817>cry<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of <S%H3905>oppressors,<s%> and he will <S%H7971>send<s%> them a <S%H3467>savior<s%> and a <S%H7227>defender,<s%> and he will deliver <S%H5337>them.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will be <S%H3045>known<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> will <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in that <S%H3117>day.<s%> <S%H5647>Yes,<s%> they will worship with <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> and <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and will <S%H5088>vow<s%> a <S%H5087>vow<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and will perform <S%H7999>it.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5062>strike<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H5062>striking<s%> and <S%H7495>healing.<s%> They will <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and he will be <S%H6279>entreated<s%> by <S%H7495>them,<s%> and will heal them.

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> there will be a <S%H4546>highway<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> and the <S%H804>Assyrian<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and the <S%H4714>Egyptian<s%> into <S%H804>Assyria;<s%> and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> will <S%H5647>worship<s%> with the <S%H804>Assyrians.<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will be the <S%H7992>third<s%> with <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and with <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%>

because <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> has <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> saying, <S%H1288>"Blessed<s%> be <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H804>Assyria<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of my <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> my <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>"
